title: WTT: My PSA Speaker for your SGC Speaker
author: Wanaselja

posts.post_title: WTT: My PSA Speaker for your SGC Speaker
posts.post_content:
I have this gorgeous Piedmont 350, PSA 3.5 Tris Speaker. Dead centered, full borders, deep blue background with fantastic registration and no creases or wrinkles. I’m looking to deal it for a similar, high quality, Speaker graded by SGC. The rest of my T206’s are in SGC slabs and, well, I’m one of those sticklers. I’m not looking to sell and I’m not looking to deal it for anything else. I bought this card from a fellow Net54er who graded the card himself. Email is best - [url]adamwanaselja@gmail.com[/url]

[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210503/4987fb36cdeaec59fabdd107bfc66bb9.jpg[/IMG]


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
